Description: This guitar was handed down to me several years ago. It has been in the case for most of that time. So, up for auction is this Strat. This is a 1998/1999 model and has been well maintained. The body finish is intact with a darker red color not easily captured by the pictures complemented by the rosewood fretboard and off white pearl pick guard. The action is good and low with no string buzz. Fretboard shows as almost new. ** YOU'RE BIDDING ON THE GUITAR IN THE CASE. I REPLACED THE PICKGUARD PERIMETER SCREWS(ORIGINALS SHOWED BEGINNING SIGNS OF LIGHT CORROSION - NORMAL FOR THIS VINTAGE) AFTER TAKING THE OTHER PHOTO'S BUT DIDN'T RETAKE PICS AFTER DOING SO. ** Always in climate controlled setting. The guitar did not travel however it is used, so there are a few scratches and a ding or two; cosmetic only. Please review the photographs carefully before bidding as they are a key part of the description. All cosmetic issues are shown in the photo's. Features;Rosewood fret-boardOff white Pearloid pick guard25.5 scale neckNeck pickup; single coilMiddle pickup ; single coilBridge pickup ; HumbuckerTorino Red finishOne volume controlTwo tone controls A case, strap, tremolo bar, some picks & extra strings(not a full set) are included. As with any electric guitar, it will need to be setup to your preferred playing style. This auction is for the lower 48 states in the United States only. As a used guitar it is being sold "as is". Again, please review the photographs as a key part of the description before bidding. Contact me to requestadditional photo's. PayPal only. Amp not included. Item will be shipped within 48 hours after payment with the exception of Sundays and federal holidays.
Title: Fender Stratocaster HSS MIM - Torina Red Pearl Pick Guard Right Handed
